search_engine.indexer

Class Vocabulary

  • java.lang.Object
    • search_engine.indexer.Vocabulary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Vocabulary>

     class Vocabulary
extends Object
implements Comparable<Vocabulary>
    The private implementation of Vocabulary in Dictionary which basically a implementation of <word, df> where word is the stemmed token and df is the number of documents the word appeared in
    The class supports Comparable, which basically compare the word of the Vocabulary
    Author:
    ngtrhieu0011

      Constructor and Description
      Vocabulary(String word)

      The df is set to 1 when initialised

        public static Vocabulary parseToVocabulary(String line)
        Static Helper - Constructor
        Parse a line from dictionary file into a Vocabulary

        Returns:
        Vocabulary the parsed Vocabulary
        null if the line is syntactically incorrect
